tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE artifacts (
  artifact_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  artifact_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  culture VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  catalog_number VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
  documentation TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE artifacts (artifact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
artifact_name VARCHAR(255),
culture VARCHAR(50),
origin VARCHAR(50),
material VARCHAR(50));

CREATE TABLE documents (document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
artifact_id INT,
document_type VARCHAR(50),
document_description TEXT,
FOREIGN KEY (artifact_id) REFERENCES artifacts(artifact_id));
CREATE TABLE artifacts_from_different_cultures ( artifact_id INT PRIMARY KEY, artifact_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, culture VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, description TEXT, acquisition_date DATE );
CREATE TABLE artifact_materials ( material_id INT PRIMARY KEY, material_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, description TEXT );
CREATE TABLE artifact_locations ( location_id INT PRIMARY KEY, location_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, country VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, region VARCHAR(50), description TEXT );

CREATE TABLE artifact_materials ( 
  material_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
  artifact_id UUID, 
  material_type VARCHAR(100), 
  quantity INTEGER, 
  FOREIGN KEY (artifact_id) REFERENCES artifacts(artifact_id) 
);

CREATE TABLE artifact_documents ( 
  document_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
  artifact_id UUID, 
  document_type VARCHAR(100), 
  document_url VARCHAR(255), 
  FOREIGN KEY (artifact_id) REFERENCES artifacts(artifact_id) 
);

CREATE TABLE artifacts_from_cultures (
    artifact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    culture_name VARCHAR(255),
    artifact_name VARCHAR(255),
    year_created INT,
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE artifact_materials (
    material_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_name VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE artifact_locations (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE artifact_images (
    image_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_url VARCHAR(255),
    artifact_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (artifact_id) REFERENCES artifacts_from_cultures(artifact_id)
)

CREATE TABLE artifact_types (
    type_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    artifact_type VARCHAR(255)
)
